statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoT_Data WHERE data_type ='temperature'
SELECT device_name, data_value FROM IoT_Data WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM IoT_Data GROUP BY device_id
SELECT device_name, data_value FROM IoT_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY data_value DESC
SELECT device_id, device_name, data_type, data_value, timestamp FROM IoT_Data WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT device_name, data_type, data_value, timestamp, device_id FROM IoT_Data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM IoT_Data WHERE data_value > 50 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT device_name, data_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM IoT_Data GROUP BY device_name, data_type ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT device_id, device_name FROM IoT_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-04-01'
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, data_type FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT device_name, data_value FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT block_id, block_data FROM Blockchain_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, block_data FROM Blockchain_Data WHERE device_id = '2ef06788-0172-4ac3-853a-ec145f7b5016';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE device_id = '365ecb71-a1d5-4bde-8c57-f8e1c88de2c0';
SELECT device_name, data_type, timestamp FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Blockchain_Data GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_data FROM Blockchain_Data WHERE block_data ->> 'status' = 'verified' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_value ->> 'temperature') AS avg_temperature FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE device_name = 'Thermostat';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoT_Device WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_name, creation_date FROM IoT_Device ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, blockchain_address FROM IoT_Device WHERE device_name LIKE 'Temperature%';
SELECT * FROM Device_Analytics WHERE analysis_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoT_Device WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoT_Device ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Device_Data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, analytics_type, analytics_result FROM IoT_Device INNER JOIN Device_Analytics ON IoT_Device.device_id = Device_Analytics.device_id WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, creation_date FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, blockchain_address FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT * FROM Device_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, analytics_type, analytics_data FROM Device_analytics WHERE analytics_type = 'Prediction' ORDER BY analytics_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, creation_date FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor' AND device_name LIKE 'Temp%' ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT device_name, data_type, data_value, timestamp FROM IoT_devices JOIN Device_data ON IoT_devices.device_id = Device_data.device_id WHERE data_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT device_name, alert_type, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM IoT_devices JOIN Device_alerts ON IoT_devices.device_id = Device_alerts.device_id WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, analytics_type, analytics_data, analytics_timestamp FROM IoT_devices JOIN Device_analytics ON IoT_devices.device_id = Device_analytics.device_id ORDER BY analytics_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, data_hash FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, TIMESTAMP FROM blockchain_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_type, analytics_result FROM analytics_data WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY analytics_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, data_value FROM real_time_data WHERE data_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, data_hash FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 1001;
SELECT status_id, status, device_name, timestamp FROM device_status INNER JOIN device_data ON device_status.device_id = device_data.device_id WHERE status = 'Online';
SELECT device_name, data_hash FROM device_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT device_name, data_type, analytics_result FROM device_data INNER JOIN analytics_data ON device_data.device_id = analytics_data.device_id WHERE analytics_result LIKE '%success%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
